metadata.title: Bram | Responsive & custom web development
metadata.description: We develop fast, responsive, and custom web applications for your digital needs. Have a project in mind? Don't hesitate to reach out, we'll get back to you as soon as possible!
metadata.ogDescription: Bram develops fast, responsive, and custom web applications for your digital needs.

items.title: Web development
items.description: Showcase sites, e-commerce, modern and responsive web applications.

items.title: Custom applications
items.description: Solutions perfectly tailored to your professional needs.

items.title: API & database integration
items.description: Secure and efficient connections between your services.

items.title: Maintenance & optimization
items.description: Monitoring, security, and scalability after launch.

items.question: How much does a website cost?
items.answer: Every project is unique. Pricing varies based on complexity, features, and your specific needs. Contact us for a personalized and transparent quote.

items.question: How long does a project take?
items.answer: On average, a showcase website takes 2-4 weeks, while a complex application may require 2-3 months. We establish a clear timeline from the start.

items.question: What do I need to start?
items.answer: Mainly your vision, goals, and any existing content (text, images, logo). We'll guide you through the rest during our first meeting.

items.question: What happens after launch?
items.answer: We offer ongoing support including technical updates, security, hosting, and adjustments. Your site stays performant and up to date.

contact.title: _ready?
contact.subtitle: let's discuss your vision and turn it into reality
